name: SCD – Smart Currency Detector – Premium Variant for WCFM
author: GaJeLabs

sections.description:
❓ Have you thought about letting your customers buy in your online shop using their own currency and payment method ❓

❓ Have you thought about reaching out to as much customers as possible worldwideüåé, offering as much payment methods as possible, with no/cheapest fees for you and your customers ❓

❓ Have you thought about doing that and use it together with the #woocommercepaypalpayments plugin, which is simply by far the best PayPal plugin for #woocommerce ❓

❓ Have you thought about handling standard currencies, together with virtual currencies, crypto currencies, reward programs, points collection ❓

❓ Does PayPal isn‚Äôt working for your local currency and you want to use it anyways, or do you want to collect money to as much payment methods as possible, without having to be registered by each of them ❓

❓ Do you want to dramatically increase trust in all your payment methods and in the refund guarantee by your website visitors ❓

❓ Do you want to get control over the (daily) high fluctuations between the currencies involved within your business ❓

üëâ And much more‚Ä¶

üëâ This increases dramatically the probability of your customers making a purchase.

üëâ Over 92% of online customers prefer to buy using their own currencies, avoiding thereby hidden costs, being fully aware of the total price in their currency.

üëâ Over 95% of online customers prefer to buy using the payment methods of their trust, they feel safe about an eventual refund, the trusted payment method is almost always cheap, this combined with their own currency implies no additional costs.

üëâ This plugin addresses all this and more, is fully compatible with all #woocommerce plugins implemented standard conform, is compatible to more than 150 payment methods worldwide, give your sales a great boost, make additional incomes per unit of sale

Make use of our 24/7 support, start now!
PS a compatibility matrix(list of compatibilities) is also available within our website https://www.gajelabs.com under the ‚ÄúCompatibility‚Äù menu

üí± SCM ‚Äì Smart Currency Manager is a plugin that manages currency conversion in a very intelligent way. It is built for single-vendor sites as well as for marketplaces. It supports you throughout the end 2 end currencies conversion process: Hier some features, the full list is availabe under https://gajelabs.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/Documentation_scd_english_all_2021-updated.pdf

SOME GENERAL FEATURES

‚úÖ Optionally set a different price per each currency, or for some currencies, for each specific product.

‚úÖ Best rates api, caching, city-level geolocalization.

‚úÖ Customization of the currencies : set manually the conversion rate compared to the base currency of the store, manage the fluctuations, choice of the currency symbol , choice of the price format.

‚úÖ Supports virtual currencies, cryptos, specific payment methods.

‚úÖ Support plugins for taxes, shipping, additional prices.

‚úÖ Several widget available with several configs.

‚úÖ When creating your pages with a page builder like elementor, you have the possibility to use a SCM shortcode to format all the prices you want to convert. The shortcode is the following

üëâ [scd_price amount=‚Äô7000‚Ä≤ from=‚Äô ‚Äò to=‚Äô ‚Äò]

üëâ The #amout# parameter allows you to set the amount

üëâ The #from# parameter allows you to set the base currency, by default when this is empty the currency is that of the woocommerce store.

üëâ The #to# parameter allows you to set the currency to which the conversion will be made, by default when this parameter is empty it will be converted to the local currency of the user or depending of the currency widget switching.

✋ IF OUR PLUGIN DOESN‚ÄôT WORK FOR YOU AFTER INSTALLATION DON‚ÄôT PANIC AND CONTACT US!!!.
OUR DEFAULT SETTING DOESN‚ÄôT WORK FOR EVERYONE AND TALKING TO US SOLVES THE PROBLEM WITH 100% GUARANTEE!!! 👇
(Link to my new video where I say that again!!!)

SOME WCFM SPECIFIC FEATURES

‚úÖ Each vendor, retailer, can set his specific local or default currency.
The vendor will be paid using that currency.
Say for example I‚Äôm in Germany and a vendor within a platform in the US.
The platform uses USD as base currency, and I can set EUR as my vendors base currency.
Which means I want to create my products in EUR and to be paid afterwards in EUR.
PS further options around are possible still.

‚úÖ It is possible to select in which currency the products shall be displayed to the end
consumer. Either the end consumers currency, or the platforms currency, or the vendors currency.
On top of that(when allowed by the use case) the consumer stills has the option to set another currency.
PS further options around are possible still.

‚úÖ We have different dashboards for the consumers or customers, the platform owners, the vendors.
Per default the order reports and statistics reflect the reality(PS we only focus on gross sales statistics). Each party gets a view according to its base or used currency.
The vendors get the orders report exactly according to the reality, Same as the shop owners and the customers.
On top of that they additionally know what it means in terms of earning in their base currency.
PS further options around are possible still.

‚úÖ The withdraw functionality is available too, in the specific base currency of the specific user role.
PS further options around are possible still.
For example expanding the withdraw functionality to an automatic, periodic process.

‚úÖ An universal payment method to all vendors can be introduced, even though the vendors, the shop owners, the customers all come from different countries, using different currencies and payment methods, this can be unified with a proprietary extension. Our extension.

‚úÖ Extendable with payout functionalities for PayPal. Our PayPal payout plugin.

‚úÖ Extendable with payout functionalities for Stripe.

‚úÖ Possible extension to universal payouts, reward systems, partial payments
(Payments partly in reward coupon, partly in fiat)

‚úÖ Optionally available fiatfiat, fiatcrypto rate api

‚úÖ Handle variable products

üÜì THIS PLUGIN HAS 3 LICENSE MODELS WITHIN 2 DIMENSIONS.
ON THE ONE END THE NUMBER OF DOMAINS AND THE OTHER END THE VALIDITY PERIOD.
however if you want additional premium features for PAYMENT GATEWAYS, WORLDWIDE TAXES, WORLDWIDE SHIPPING, WORLDWIDE ACCOUNTING, BOOKING SITES, AUCTION SITES, ETC, get in contact with us. üëâemail: admin@gajelabs.com; skype: gajelabs; whatsapp: 00 49 176 636 397 50.

DOCUMENTATION

üëâ Check our documentation: https://gajelabs.com/store/scd-products/scd-smart-currency-detector-premium-variant-for-wcfm/?Currency=EUR
=> Click on ‚Äúdownload general documentation‚Äù

QUICK SUPPORT

We provide 24/7 support, even in our busiest schedule. Getting in contact with us from the GaJeLabs team.
Skype: gajelabs.
Whatsapp 00 49 176 636 397 50.
Email: admin@gajelabs.com.

PS we can communicate in the language of your choice!!!

Please create any support request under the following link, thank you !
Link to assistance
sections.faq:
✍ Is it mandatory to download the free version of SCD?

✔ Yes, it is mandatory to download the free version of SCD. In addition to the variant of our product that you purchased, you also need to download the free version. For example, a marketplace administrator who purchases scd for wc vendors must also download the free version of the product so that everything works. This also applies to other variants of our plugin Even the 7 days trial version works with the free version installed at the same time

✍ How do I contact the support team?

✔ You can contact our support team by writing to us at support@gajelabs.com

✍How Can I Earn Money With Smart Currency Convertor (SCD)?

✔-First scenario : You can manually setup the exchange rate from one specific currency to another, and you can set up an additional percentage to tack on top of the conversion rate (add an extra 10% for example).

✔-second scenario : ‚ÄûSecond scenario: set up manually the products price for a specific currency. E.g. the product costs 20USD, as USD being your default currency, and you additionally, manually set it up for ‚Ç¨37‚Äú.

✍I am the admin of a marketplace.Can I get my commissions in the currency of my choice even if my sellers have received their payment in a currency different from mine?

✔The marketplace admin can decide the currency in which to receive their commissions, even if the seller displays their products in a different currency. In other words, the marketplace admin can receive their commissions in US dollars even if their sellers receive their sales in uk pounds.

✍What payment gateways is scd compatible with?

✔-Paypal Standard – Paypal Express Checkout – PayUMoney – PayUMoney Bolt -Stripe – cash on delivery -Payzen -Cardcom -Visa -Mastercard -Googlepay -Applepay -Bitcoin -Square -Payzen -Paystack -Mercadopago – Konnect – Flow.cl

✍Plugin doesn’t work with my theme ?

✔ We are not compatible with all the themes in wordpress, but with can provide custom implementation. You can contact our support team by writing to us at support@gajelabs.com.

✍Your plugin doesn’t work well in my shop ?

✔ Check if you don’t have another conversion plugin or if or if it interferes with other site plugins or if you are using some plugin features that our plugin is not compatible to. You can contact our support team by writing to us at support@gajelabs.com.

✍ I need a specific feature ?

✔ You can contact our support team by writing to us at support@gajelabs.com. we can explained more about our plugin features and provide custom implementations as needed.
